dialogue.htmlContent:
Adjoining the main atrium of the Gambling Den, you spot an open-fronted shop, with the sign 'Roxy's Fun Box' fixed to the wall above the opening. The interior is filled with rows of shelves, holding all manner of different goods, but despite quite obviously being open for business, the shop floor looks to be completely deserted. Wanting to investigate further, you step forwards into the empty store, before starting to look around for any sign of the owner, 'Roxy'.

The first thing that strikes you as you enter is the fact that the interior smells strongly of cigarette smoke; a clear indication that the currently-absent owner must be a very heavy smoker indeed. Although there's a counter prominently running along half the length of the far wall, you can't see anyone standing behind it, and, recalling Axel's warning that you should watch yourself around Roxy, you carefully start walking up and down the aisles, on the lookout for any sign of trouble.

As you're taking a look at some of the goods on offer, you suddenly hear movement coming from behind the shop's counter, and, turning to face it, you see a rather scruffy-looking rat-girl standing up, before yawning and stretching her arms up above her head. The very next thing she does after waking from her nap is grab a cigarette from under the counter, before putting it in her mouth and inhaling a lungful of smoke.

Using this opportunity to take a good look at the rat-girl, the first thing you notice about her is the series of claw-shaped scars running down over one side of her face. A black eye patch conceals whatever damage this old wound has done to her eye, which gives her a rather ominous appearance. The second thing you notice about this brown-furred rat-girl is the fact that she's wearing an abundance of gold jewellery, with every possible piercing that you can imagine being home to some form of gaudy ornament or another.

As she catches sight of you with her good eye, the rat-girl sneers, before unleashing one of the most profane greetings you've ever heard, [roxy.speech(Heh, someone's finally fuckin' come to buy some o' my shit. Well, that'd fuckin' better be what yer here for. The last cunt that came in here just fuckin' stood around like some gormless twat, an' I had to fuckin' scream at 'im to get 'im to fuck off. You don't look like a complete fuckin' idiot, so I'm hopin' yer gonna buy somethin', an' not waste my fuckin' time.)]

At this point, the foul-mouthed rat-girl smirks at you, before inhaling deeply on her cigarette once again. Blowing out a huge cloud of white smoke, she lets a cackling, grating laughter burst out from between her lips. Placing both of her hands on the counter in front of her, she leans forwards and, cigarette hanging from her mouth, continues, [roxy.speech(The name's Roxy. You got a problem with any o' my prices, or what I've got fer sale, you fuckin' keep it to yerself, ya got me?)]

[pc.speech(Right...)] you say, taken a little off-guard by just how crass Roxy is. [pc.speech(I'm [pc.name].)]

[roxy.speech(Heh. You ain't like most of the cunts that wander in 'ere. I can tell there's somethin' real special about yer,)] Roxy grins, before beckoning you closer with one hand. Deciding to follow along for now, you step towards the counter, allowing her to continue, [roxy.speech(I don't offer this to any ol' cunt what wanders in here, but I got a real fuckin' special deal fer you. Not gonna give yer the whole story, cos I ain't got time fer that shit, but a couple o' years ago I used to wander 'round that shithole they call Dominion, an' I came across this real fuckin' hung horse-boy runnin' a shop up there. Well, he showed me his cock, fuckin' huge it was, an' said he'd sell me his stuff real cheap if I'd blow 'im right then and there. Well, there ain't no way I was sayin' no to that!)] Roxy bursts out laughing yet again; the sudden, grating noise causes you to flinch. Inhaling on her cigarette, Roxy carelessly blows the smoke all over you as she continues with her story, [roxy.speech(So anyways, I'd keep on goin' back to suck his fuckin' huge cock and get a real good price on the shit he was sellin'. Anyways, the whole point o' this story is that it gave me an idea, y'see?)]

Roxy pauses for a moment, and, hoping that she's finally getting to the point, you ask, [pc.speech(What idea was that?)]

[roxy.speech(Ay! Don't fuckin' interrupt!)] she berates you, before once again bursting out in her abrasive laughter. Before you can react to her rude reply, she continues, [roxy.speech(Now that I've got my own shop and shit, I was thinkin' I'd do the same as that fuckin' horse-boy, but make it even better! Instead of just givin' yer some kinda shitty discount, if yer wanna come lick my cunt 'til I cum, I'll give yer a fuckin' free item from my shop!)]

[pc.speech(What kind of free item?)] you ask, immediately regretting asking your question, as it causes Roxy to let out yet another of her infuriatingly annoying laughs.

[roxy.speech(I got a couple o' dice here. Yer come down here and let me plant my fuckin' sweet cunt on yer face, and I'll roll these to decide on a random fuckin' item from my shop. Whattya say?)]

Before you can answer, Roxy steps back from the counter, pulling up the skirt of her dress with one hand to reveal the fact that she's not wearing any underwear. As you look down at the sudden movement, she reaches down with her free hand to spread her exposed pussy, blowing out yet another cloud of smoke as she teases you, [roxy.speech(Come on, I can tell yer want a taste o' my fuckin' cunt! All yer gotta do is get yer fuckin' tongue buried in here an' get me ta cum. Easiest item you'll ever earn!)]

As you step foot inside Roxy's store once again, you see the one-eyed rat-girl leaning on the counter over on the far side of the room, puffing away on a cigarette. Just a moment later, she sees you entering her shop, and calls out, [roxy.speech(Hey [pc.name]! Yer back to buy some o' this shit I got on offer?)]

[pc.speech(Hi, Roxy,)] you reply, [pc.speech(I just wanted to see what you've got in stock.)]

[roxy.speech(Well, seein' as it's you, I don't mind yer takin' a look around fer a bit. Oh, and remember, if yer want a free item, my special offer's still on!)] Roxy says, before bursting out in her abrasive laughter. [roxy.speech(All yer gotta do is come lie behind my counter fer an hour, so I can plant my sweet fuckin' cunt on yer face!)]

Just a moment later, she sees you entering her shop, and calls out, [roxy.speech(Hey, [pc.name]! Yer got a craving fer my fuckin' cunt, haven't yer?)]

Stepping to one side, she then lifts up the hinged part of the counter, before grinning at you. [roxy.speech(Come on then! Get back here and fuckin' lie down already!)]

You eagerly do as the rat-girl says, and hurry forwards behind the counter. As you pass by her, she lets out a big puff of cigarette smoke, before reaching down and giving your [pc.ass+] a shap slap. Letting out another grating laugh, she lets the counter-top slam shut behind you and says, [roxy.speech(Yer just fuckin' desperate fer another taste o' my cunt, ain't yer? Now hurry up and get down already. I'm eager ta get this started!)]

Once again doing as Roxy says, you quickly lie down on your back behind the counter. Looking up, you see Roxy hike up her skirt, before stepping over your face and sinking down onto her knees. With her [roxy.pussy+] now hovering just above your face, Roxy looks down into your eyes and sneers, [roxy.speech(You'd better make this fuckin' good, y'hear? Get that fuckin' tongue of yours nice 'n deep! Yer did a good job at servicing my cunt the last time, so you'd better put the same fuckin' amount of effort into it now!)]

Get that fuckin' tongue of yours nice 'n deep! I ain't had my cunt serviced fer a fuckin' while now, so you'd better put some fuckin' effort into it!)]

[roxy.speech(Alright, alright, no need to be such a fuckin' cunt about it,)] Roxy huffs, lowering her skirt and leaning down on the counter once more. Taking a deep drag of her cigarette, she blows the smoke out in your general direction, grinning mischievously at you as she says, [roxy.speech(Yer still ain't as bad as most o' the stupid twats that wander in 'ere, so if yer ever change yer mind, just let me know, ok? Remember, yer get a free fuckin' item outta it!)]

[pc.speech(Ok, I'll keep that in mind,)] you say, before moving off to look around the store.

Looking down to see you doing this, the rat-girl lets out another of her annoying laughs, before stepping to one side and denying you a final taste of her juices. [roxy.speech(Come on now! Two or three, yer get a vanilla water, then four or five, it's one o' those fruit boxes the bat-morphs fuckin' love. Then, if yer lucky enough to get over that, it's a mother's milk for six an' seven, a bottle o' rum for eight or nine, a fuckin' burger for ten or eleven, and, if yer really, really fuckin' lucky, yer get a bottle o' angel's tears for a twelve.)]

The first dice stops on a [#SPECIAL_PARSE_0], and the second dice stops on a [#SPECIAL_PARSE_1], giving a total value of [#SPECIAL_PARSE_2].

[roxy.speech(Well, would yer fuckin' look at that!)] Roxy exclaims, looking down at the result of her roll. [roxy.speech(That fuckin' gets yer [#SPECIAL_PARSE_3]!)]

I'll be makin' the value o' that back soon enough! Yer gonna get some real fuckin' nice cravings fer my cunt before long, and when yer do, yer gonna come crawlin' back here beggin' fer another taste o' my fuckin' sweet nectar. I think a thousand flames is a fair price, so make sure yer bring yer cash with yer when the cravings kick in! Heh!)]

Looking down to see you doing this, the rat-girl lets out another of her annoying laughs, before stepping to one side and denying you a final taste of her juices. [roxy.speech(Come on now! That's fuckin' enough! Get back to the other side o' the counter!)]

You reluctantly do as Roxy says, and, lifting up the counter top, you step back around to the other side.
